description.raw:
This is a fix for the following problem:

1. Compile and install the Swarm libraries.
1. Compile and install the `example/` directory.
1. Run gazebo (everything is OK):
 
```
#!python

gazebo worlds/lost_person.world --verbose
```

1. Make some change in `example/LostPersonControllerPlugin.cc`.
1. Recompile and install the `example/` directory.
1. Run gazebo (you should get an error):
 
```
#!python

gazebo worlds/lost_person.world --verbose
```
You should get the following error:


```
#!python

[Err] [Plugin.hh:165] Failed to load plugin libLostPersonControllerPlugin.so: /home/caguero/local/lib/libLostPersonControllerPlugin.so: undefined symbol: _ZN5swarm16LostPersonPlugin4LoadEN5boost10shared_ptrIN6gazebo7physics5ModelEEESt10shared_ptrIN3sdf7ElementEE
```

This patch should fix it.
description.html:
This is a fix for the following problem:

  1. Compile and install the Swarm libraries.
  2. Compile and install the example/ directory.
  3. Run gazebo (everything is OK):
gazebo worlds/lost_person.world --verbose
  1. Make some change in example/LostPersonControllerPlugin.cc.
  2. Recompile and install the example/ directory.
  3. Run gazebo (you should get an error):
gazebo worlds/lost_person.world --verbose

You should get the following error:

[Err] [Plugin.hh:165] Failed to load plugin libLostPersonControllerPlugin.so: /home/caguero/local/lib/libLostPersonControllerPlugin.so: undefined symbol: _ZN5swarm16LostPersonPlugin4LoadEN5boost10shared_ptrIN6gazebo7physics5ModelEEESt10shared_ptrIN3sdf7ElementEE

This patch should fix it.

title: Fix lost person problem
